basics.name: Jozef William Dransfield
basics.label: Agile Full Stack Development
basics.summary:
I am a very motivated and dedicated software engineer, who believes in agile practices helping make sure quality software is delivered on time and to budget. With many years of experience working in a multitude of languages on the full application stack.

I am very product focused and will not shy away from tackling any area necessary to getting a project done.

I consider myself very adapt at communicating effectively with non technical interested parties

work.summary: Dismantleing a long neglected time dependand key value database running at scale, and replacing it with a microservices system deployed into the banks internal kubernetes solution
Extending the current prime brokerage system to support United State Arranged Financing.
Developing the Delta Capita strategic platform (with emphasis on reusable components for rapid prototyping and delivery of business solutions)
highlights: Serverless Message Driven architecture (Amazon Lambda, Amazon SQS)
S3 immutable storage for business data.
Angular / React monorepo using nx.js to combine the components into one platform user interface.
NodeJS express apps that function as the lambda code

work.summary: Developed the workflow based structured product lifecycle orchestration app using Flowable from scratch. (BPMN)
highlights: We provided the orchestration that tied the individual micro services into a system for documenting, costing and selling structued products.
We built the new system product store for capturing product state.
Pushing forward with new ways to test and coordinate microservices within our group.
Pushing forward with new ways to orchestrate our deployments with our group.
Maintaining existing structured product software solutions

work.summary: Extending core login and entitlements software for Sky's online video platform.
highlights: Everything we built had to have its resources properly scaled, using multiples of real world data and tools like Gatling to replicate load scenarios, so that we could scale our kubrenetes resources appropriately.
Everything had to be monitored, using Prometheus to capture metrics and defining alerts for conditions that needed investigating.

work.summary: Automated reporting system to replace manual workflows for the supply chain finance system with third parties.
Develop a new application to generate and manage the lifecycle for KID (Key Information Documents) for Credit Suisse's structured products.
Working alongside DB employees in Romania to meet a deadline for a new counterparty management app within the bank. Working cross concerns to get the software delivered
Develop a new application for pricing parameters, the application acts as a rule repository and executor for rules written by business users, with high traffic expectations
Leading a small team to develop the FightMe web, ios and androids apps. Hands on developing the front and backends for the site
Develop the Cochrane Search app for public use, that queries across years of medical research publications stored in a marklogic database
Develop support applications for Sky broadband's roll out of FTTC products. Used by the customer support teams within sky.
highlights: Utterly Idle/Totally Lazy (Functional Java libraries) Rest

work.summary: Extend SkyID online login portal with new services and features
Develop core components used by wealth management system
